title: Fix ICPInfoPage: heading text and top section readability

requirements.summary: Change the heading from 'teknologiinformasjon' to 'Vår teknologi' in the ICPInfoPage top section
acceptanceCriteria: The heading in the top section of ICPInfoPage reads 'Vår teknologi' and not 'teknologiinformasjon'.

file_operations.description: Locate the heading element in the top/hero section that currently displays 'teknologiinformasjon' and change its text content to 'Vår teknologi'. Ensure the heading maintains its existing styling and structure.

requirements.summary: Change all text in the ICPInfoPage top section to black for improved readability
acceptanceCriteria: All text (headings and body paragraphs) in the top section of ICPInfoPage is rendered in black.
Text is legible against the background.

file_operations.description: Apply black text color (text-black or equivalent) to all text elements (headings, paragraphs, and any other text content) within the top/hero section. Update the className or style props to ensure all text is rendered in black, overriding any existing color classes that may be causing poor contrast.

requirements.summary: Increase the CSS blur effect on the ICPInfoPage top section background image
acceptanceCriteria: The background image in the top section of ICPInfoPage has a noticeably stronger blur effect than before.
The increased blur makes the overlaid text easier to read.

file_operations.description: Locate the background image styling in the top/hero section and increase the blur filter value. If using a backdrop-blur utility class, change it to a higher value (e.g., from backdrop-blur-sm to backdrop-blur-lg or backdrop-blur-xl). If using inline styles or custom CSS with filter: blur(), increase the pixel value (e.g., from blur(4px) to blur(12px) or higher) to create a more pronounced blur effect that improves text readability.
